mn122:7.3: sannisādeti ekodiṃ karoti → ekodikaroti (s1-3, km, pts1)
mn122:18.1: dhammā ekantakusalā kusalāyātikā → dhammā ekan­ta­kusa­lā­yatikā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1) | dhammā ekan­ta­kusa­lā­yātikā (si)
mn122:19.2: api paṇujjamāno”ti → api panujjamānoti (bj, pts1) | api ­panuj­ja­māno­pīti (si) | api­payuj­ja­mānoti (s1-3, km)
mn122:20.1: veyyākaraṇaṃ tassa hetu → veyyākaraṇassa sotuṃ (s1-3) | veyyākaraṇassa hetu (pts1, mr)
mn122:22.4: mucchaṃ nikāmayati → mucchati nikāyamati (bj) | mucchati kāmayati (si, pts1)
mn122:27.3: pavayha pavayha, ānanda, vakkhāmi → pavayha ānanda pavayha vakkhāmi (bj) | pavayha pavayha (pts1) | paggayha paggayha ānanda vakkhāmi (mr)
